CHLORINE Most common sanitizer used Pools / spas are closed for chlorine residuals over 10 ppm. 1.0 ppm or 1.5 ppm at minimum Chlorine combines with ammonia to form chloramines. Used in liquid, gas, tablet or granular forms
CHLORINE
Most common sanitizer used
Pools / spas are closed for chlorine
residuals over 10 ppm.
1.0 ppm or 1.5 ppm at minimum
Chlorine combines with ammonia to form
chloramines.
Used in liquid, gas, tablet or granular
forms
